static dist(planet_1, planet_2)Â¶

Calculate the distance between two vectors :param planet_1: the position of the planet2 :param planet_2: the position ot the planet1 :return: the distance as vector and as absolute value

>>> dist((1,1,1),(5,5,5))
(6.928203230275509, array([-4, -4, -4]))
